p: The Medical Subject Headings (MeSH terms) for HIV and AIDS and key terms “Integrase”, “Dolutegravir”, “Raltegravir”, “Elvitegravir”, “drug resistance”, “resource-limited settings”, and “Sub-Saharan Africa” will be cross-referenced with terms associated with 56 African countries (Additional file 2 shows the detailed search strategy for Pubmed, Embase, and CINAHL). We will update the search prior to publication to include any additional eligible papers published recently.
